title: Happy 15th!
body:
A Tempest in a Teapot
(hires)
Cyberspace Needs Trees
(hires)
A comment on my previous blog entry pointed out that Java's 15th birthday is right about now. It's been quite a roller coaster. Seeing what people have done with Java over the years has been totally awe-inspiring.

Now is also roughly the time when JavaOne would have been happening. Mostly because it's fun (and great therapy), I whipped up a couple of images that Oracle could use for t-shirts if they'd like. I'd like to think that they'll pull a rabbit out of a hat when they do their version of JavaOne in the fall, and end up with something cool and interesting.

Thanks to those who "liked" me on the 25 years of .com site. I'm not quite 10x Oracle's score, but I'm pretty comfortably ahead.
